mapper.select: SELECT b_seller_account_id, b_seller_id FROM b_seller_account WHERE 1=1
SELECT b_seller_account_id, b_seller_id FROM b_seller_account WHERE b_seller_account_id=#{b_seller_account_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_seller_account ( b_seller_account_id, b_seller_id ) VALUES ( #{b_seller_account_id}, #{b_seller_id} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM b_seller_account WHERE b_seller_account_id IN
#{item}
